nodes.text: Jedi Mind Trick was an aqua-colored alcoholic beverage served at Oga's Cantina in Black Spire Outpost on the planet Batuu in 34 ABY. The flavor would change as a person drank it. The cocktail was suitable for human consumption; however, the drink had no effect on Hutts. It shared its name with the Force ability of the same name performed by the Jedi.

On one occassion in 34 ABY, Resistance spy Vi Moradi drank a non-alcoholic Blurrgfire to stay sober and hangover-free, and bought a potent Jedi Mind Trick for her ex-First Order companion Archex. To Moradi's amusement, Archex became intoxicated and attempted to flirt with their waitress.

The Jedi Mind Trick is one of the alcoholic beverages sold to customers at the Oga's Cantina bar in Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge. It was first revealed as part of a large promotional event held on February 26, 2019. According to Amy Ratcliffe, the drink is intended to be different at its start and its finish. The menu's description reads, "Grapefruit and rose vodka, falernum, blue curaçao, white grape juice, lime juice, and grapefruit bitters."
